job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
     * Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
     * Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
     * Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.
job_details.full_text:
Solutions Engineer

* Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
     * Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
     * Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
     * Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on pre-sales engineering, customer demonstrations, and sales pipeline support, rather than core AI/ML development or engineering. While it mentions evaluating solutions, it lacks specific details on building, training, or deploying AI models.

phrases.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
phrases.justification: This phrase demonstrates understanding of how to align technical capabilities (Dataiku) with customer business value and competitive positioning.

phrases.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
phrases.justification: This involves understanding sales processes and contributing to business development efforts.

phrases.phrase: Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting
phrases.justification: This requires understanding business needs for reporting and forecasting.

phrases.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
phrases.justification: While not direct development, providing technical guidance on solutions implies a level of understanding of how software/platforms function and are integrated.

phrases.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer
phrases.justification: Coordinating resources for evaluations and POCs touches on the operational aspects of deploying and showcasing solutions, though not in a production MLOps sense.
